# Tasks
#1 Setup Project Structure (TODO)
Setup the basic project structure for the YogaTime app including backend, frontend and database.
#2 Setup Backend with FastAPI (TODO)
Setup the backend for the YogaTime app using FastAPI.
#3 Setup Frontend with React (TODO)
Setup the frontend for the YogaTime app using React.
#4 Setup Database with SQLite (TODO)
Setup the database for the YogaTime app using SQLite.
name: add_task
